meanings.definition: A local government body in Russia.
meanings.sent1: The zemstvos in Russia help communities with local issues.
meanings.sent2: People in the village rely on the zemstvos for support.
meanings.sent3: The zemstvos organized a fun fair for the town.
meanings.sent4: The zemstvos are the heart of the community, connecting people together.
meanings.sent5: Children learn about civic duty through the work of the zemstvos.

meanings.sent1: Many zemstvos work together to improve the region.
meanings.sent2: The history books mention the various zemstvos across Russia.
meanings.sent3: At the party, guests debated the pronunciation of zemstvos.
meanings.sent4: The fields were filled with zemstvos, symbolizing unity.
meanings.sent5: The colorful zemstvos dotted the landscape, creating a beautiful sight.
